sentences.sContent: I see what you mean (= I understand what you are saying ) .
‘He lives here but works in London during the week.’ ‘Oh, I see (= I understand ) .’
sentences.sCn: “他住在这里，但平时都在伦敦上班。”“噢，我明白了。”

sentences.sContent: You see, the thing is, I’m really busy right now (= used when you are explaining something ) .
sentences.sCn: 你看，问题是我现在真的很忙。

sentences.sContent: You mix the flour and eggs like this, see (= used to check that someone is listening and understands ) ?
sentences.sCn: 你要这样搅拌面粉和鸡蛋，明白了吗？

sentences.sContent: I can’t see the point of (= I do not understand the reason for ) spending so much money on a car.
sentences.sCn: 我看不出花这么多钱买一辆车有什么意义。

sentences.sContent: Do you see the point I’m making (= do you understand what I’m trying to say ) ?
sentences.sCn: 你明白我说的意思了吗？

sentences.sContent: The other officers laughed, but Nichols couldn’t see the joke .
sentences.sCn: 其他警官都笑了，但尼科尔斯却听不懂有什么好笑。

phrases.pCn: 看中(或喜欢)某人的某个方面
经常和…在一起；经常见到
[美国口语]听我说；喂(唤起对方注意或表示不赞成)
正如你所看到的；你是知道的
再见；待会儿见；希望尽快见到你
